wikipedia_page.main: Charles Gordon McLeod (27 December 1890 – 16 October 1963) was an English actor.  He was born in Market Giffard, Ivybridge, Devon.His film appearances include Chance of a Lifetime and The Silent Passenger, but he is best known for his recurring appearance as the character Claud Eustace Teal in films such as The Saint Meets the Tiger.
